section.p: "This field identifies the treatment product or treatment ordered to be given to the patient; it is analogous to OBR-4-universal service ID in function. Examples of treatments products include medications and certain devices or supplies, e.g., inhaler spacers, blood glucose monitors, syringes, infusion sets, which might require prescription." - HL7 Version 2.8, RXO-1

ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] product, where its type is Product
